name: SoftSol
tag_list: software-development--testing, application-development--testing, automated-migration-tools, application-development--testing-services, software-development--testing-services, automated-migration-services, application-testing-services, software-testing, ap
overview:
“SoftSol is a CMMi Level3 certified company that serves many industries with our advanced IT solutions including the public sector, media, high tech, and life sciences. We offer application development and testing, on demand software testing, modernization, Big Data, business process automation, cloud, and mobility services that help our customers solve business problems and significantly improve efficiency, innovation, compliance, and cost savings.

Our services include STiC cloud software testing which is completely pay-per-use, allowing users to share resources and tools on demand, converting CAPEX to OPEX. Our software modernization reduces maintenance costs and leverages the flexibility and robust functionality of newer technologies. We migrate Oracle forms and PowerBuilder applications to JAVA or .NET platforms based on requirements. Our Forte/UDS migration tool automatically converts up to 99% of the Forte code to either a Java/J2EE or .NET environment and also maximizes speed and accuracy. We follow complete Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) activities and provide end-to-end solutions to our customers, which can reduce costs by 50-75%.

Our products include programs customized for public sector needs such as our IntelliCourt and corporate investigations case management systems, our bug testing tool BUGFAST, and modernization tools that empower organizations to achieve greater productivity in shorter timelines. Our case management systems allow unprecedented coordination within the justice system, including document management, court scheduling, forms generation, judicial notes, bail calculation, and accounting. And BUGFAST, certified by HP, empowers business analysts to create, execute, and maintain automated test scripts.

Contact us today for a free demo or quote! (510) 824-2000 or info@softsol.com. www.softsol.com”
